titleStmt.title: A treatise of the nesssity and frequency of receiving the Holy Communion With a resolution of doubts about it. In three discourses begun upon Whit-Sunday in the cathedral church of Peterburgh. To press the observation of the fourth Rubrick after the communion office. By Symon Patrick, D.D. Dean of Peterburgh, and one of Hi [sic] Majesties Chaplains in Ordinary.
titleStmt.author: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.M. for R. Royston, bookseller to His most Sacred Majesty, at the Angel in Amen-Corner,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pp. 59, 60 are torn, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
